ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | spcimdv.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. B ) |
| 2 |  | spcimdv.2 | |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> ( ps -> ch ) ) |
| 3 | 2 | #P_ex | |- ( ph -> ( x = A -> ( ps -> ch ) ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_alrimiv | |- ( ph -> A. x ( x = A -> ( ps -> ch ) ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_nfv | |- F/ x ch |
| 6 |  | #P_nfcv | |- F/_ x A |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_spcimgft | |- ( A. x ( x = A -> ( ps -> ch ) ) -> ( A e. B -> ( A. x ps -> ch ) ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 1, 7 | #P_sylc | |- ( ph -> ( A. x ps -> ch ) ) |
